attributes.action: Broaden the options of British citizenship for passport identity.
attributes.background: English, Scottish and Welsh nationalities have to state they are British citizens on their passports. Whereas northern Ireland citizens can state they are Irish or have an Irish passport. For equality in national identity, this option needs to widened to all UK nationalities, as stated above.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition which clearly outlines what action you would like the UK Government and Parliament to take.
